name: Power Platform Solution Architect Expert
description: Expert-level certification for end-to-end Power Platform solution architecture, Dataverse modeling, and enterprise governance.

name: Azure Developer Associate
description: Validates skills in designing, building, testing, and maintaining cloud applications and services on Microsoft Azure.

name: Power Platform Developer Associate
description: Validates skills in designing and developing Power Platform solutions including custom components, plugins, and integrations.

name: Power Platform Functional Consultant Associate
description: Certification for configuring and extending Power Apps, Power Automate, and Dataverse for business solutions.

name: Azure AI Engineer Associate
description: Covers designing and implementing AI solutions using Azure Cognitive Services, Language Studio, and Azure Machine Learning.

name: Automation Anywhere Advanced RPA Professional
description: Advanced RPA certification for building, deploying, and managing enterprise-grade bot automation workflows.
